I firmly believe that every individual deserves fair treatment and respect, regardless of their background or circumstances. Intentionally, I would like this experiment to contribute positively to both ourselves and the larger community. Knowing that we are paired with someone whose life experiences might be very similar but not identical, there's an opportunity for understanding and connection through shared struggles and resilience.
